text: Drago is a wool mill founded in 1973 by Umberto and Laura Drago in Biella, Italy.INTRODUCING DRAGO CLOTH: PIEDMONTESE PERFECTION Their son, Paolo Drago, is the current President and CEO.dragobiella.it History The mill produces 1,750,000 meters of fabrics per year. Drago fabrics are exported all over the world.Lanieri, 2015 Collection fabrics Drago sells some fabric under its own brand, but sells mainly under other brand labels.permanentstyle.com Italy’s mills and merchants explained, July 29, 2013 ==References== ==See also== *Ermenegildo Zegna *Loro Piana *Dormeuil *Holland & Sherry *Carlo Barbera *Cerruti Category:Companies of Italy Category:Textile companies of Italy Category:Luxury brands
